name: Xuan's journey
description:
"Xuan will have to use her light in order to escape from the hidden mayan temples."

Xuan's journey is my first-year project. I work on it for 6weeks, and my constraints were: Create 2D platformer in HTML & CSS.

INFORMATION

Type : Puzzle game 

Player :  1 player

Developed with Phaser 

INPUT

Move left :  Q

Move right :  D

Jump : Z

Flash : SPACE BAR

HAVE FUN!!
